description: A video of Rory Steel's nine-year-old daughter Ava using the device has had more than 800,000 views.
title: Dad builds Nintendo games controller for disabled daughter
title_page: Dad builds Nintendo games controller for disabled daughter - BBC News
maintext: He said Ava had "actually stolen the limelight", but the younger sibling was "straight in afterwards" to also play The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild.
